title: Warning
confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete?

forbidden.title: Oops! Access denied...
forbidden.description: You do not have permission to access this page.
forbidden.list: To access, you need to use one of the following modules:

locked.title: Access blocked
locked.description: Access for {{company}} has been blocked. Contact the administrator for more information.

level_empty.title: Access level without permissions...
level_empty.description: Contact the system administrator to assign permissions to this access level.

level_inactive.title: Inactive access level...
level_inactive.description: Contact the system administrator to change or reactivate the access level.

test_expired.title: Trial period expired
test_expired.description: Your trial period has expired. Please update your subscription to continue using the system.

test_ending.title: Trial period ending
test_ending.description: Your trial period ends in {{days}} day(s). Please update your subscription to continue using the system.

subscription_not_renewed.title: Renewal not completed
subscription_not_renewed.description: We were unable to renew your subscription. Regularize your payment to continue using the system. Your access will be blocked in {{days}} day(s).

subscription_expired.title: Access blocked
subscription_expired.description: We were unable to renew your subscription. Regularize your payment to continue using the system.

subscription_canceled.title: Subscription canceled
subscription_canceled.description: Your subscription has been canceled. To continue using the system, you need to update your subscription.
